info.title: Trio Daily API
info.description: API documentation for Trio Daily application endpoints including authentication, account management, sales, routes, notifications, and truck management.

post.description: Authenticate a kiosk user and return an access token.
Send OTP to the user for verification.

put.description: Validate the OTP sent to the user.

resetToken.description: JWT reset token for password change

put.description: Change the password for the user.

delete.description: Logout the authenticated user and invalidate the token.

get.description: Get daily user permissions including module and field permissions.
Retrieve the top selling products based on sales data.
Retrieve the top selling locations based on sales data.
Retrieve KPI dashboard data for sales metrics.
Retrieve revenue trend data over time.
Retrieve list of machines for DEX operations.

put.description: Process DEX read operation for a machine.

get.description: Retrieve list of trucks.
Retrieve inventory for a specific truck.
Retrieve pulled products for a specific truck.
Retrieve notification logs for a specific user.
Retrieve notification settings for a specific user.

put.description: Update notification settings for a user.

post.description: Create a new notification log entry.

put.description: Update an existing notification log entry.

get.description: Retrieve list of routes with optional status filtering.
Retrieve locations for a specific route plan.
Retrieve machines for a specific location in a route plan.
Retrieve detailed information for a specific machine in a route plan.

parameters.name: routePlanMachineId
parameters.description: ID of the route plan machine

put.description: Manually update a route plan machine.

parameters.name: routePlanMachineId
parameters.description: ID of the route plan machine

get.description: Retrieve prekitted products for a route plan machine.

parameters.name: routePlanMachineId
parameters.description: ID of the route plan machine

post.description: Update prekitted products for route planning.

put.description: Recalculate routes for a specific machine.

parameters.name: routePlanMachineId
parameters.description: ID of the route plan machine

get.description: Retrieve inventory for a specific machine in a route plan.

post.description: Update machine inventory with detailed information for a route plan.

get.description: Retrieve products for the organization excluding a specific product.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product to exclude

post.description: Upload service details with optional file attachments.

get.description: Retrieve the current user's profile information.
Retrieve the current user's profile image details.

put.description: Update the current user's profile image.

get.description: Retrieve the current user's theme mode preference.

put.description: Update the current user's theme mode preference.

parameters.name: themeMode
parameters.description: The theme mode to set (light, dark, or auto)

resetToken.description: JWT reset token received from OTP validation

moduelName.description: Name of the module or field

inventoryItems.description: List of inventory items to update

postedOn.description: Date and time when the note was posted

postedBy.description: Name of the user who posted the note

machineImageId.description: Unique identifier for the machine image

fileKey.description: Storage key or filename for the image

Unauthorized.description: Unauthorized access - invalid or missing authentication

TooManyRequests.description: Too many requests - rate limit exceeded
